file.content:
# c3-101: Entry Point

## Purpose

Application entry point.

## Location

`src/index.ts`

## Status

Active - this file exists.

# c3-102: Auth Middleware

## Purpose

JWT authentication middleware.

## Location

`src/middleware/auth.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Auth is now handled inline in index.ts.

## Dependencies

- jsonwebtoken library (removed)

# c3-103: Post Routes

## Purpose

CRUD operations for blog posts.

## Location

`src/routes/posts.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.

## Endpoints (historical)

- GET /posts
- POST /posts
- GET /posts/:id
- PUT /posts/:id
- DELETE /posts/:id

# c3-104: Comment Routes

## Purpose

CRUD operations for comments on posts.

## Location

`src/routes/comments.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.

# c3-105: Database Layer

## Purpose

Database abstraction for persistence.

## Location

`src/db.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Data is now mocked inline.

# c3-1-api: REST API Server

## Purpose

Main API server for blog functionality.

## Components

| ID | Name | Location | Status |
|----|------|----------|--------|
| c3-101 | entry-point | src/index.ts | Active |
| c3-102 | auth-middleware | src/middleware/auth.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-103 | post-routes | src/routes/posts.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-104 | comment-routes | src/routes/comments.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-105 | database | src/db.ts | STALE - file removed |

expectations.text: Agent identifies c3-102 (auth-middleware) references non-existent src/middleware/auth.ts
expectations.reasoning: The output clearly shows c3-102-auth-middleware.md with Location 'src/middleware/auth.ts' and Status 'STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring. Auth is now handled inline in index.ts.'

expectations.text: Agent identifies c3-103 (post-routes) references non-existent src/routes/posts.ts

expectations.text: Agent identifies c3-104 (comment-routes) references non-existent src/routes/comments.ts
expectations.reasoning: The output clearly shows c3-104-comment-routes.md with Location 'src/routes/comments.ts' and Status 'STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring. Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.'

expectations.text: Agent recommends updating docs to reflect consolidated index.ts structure
expectations.reasoning: The documentation has been updated to indicate the v2 consolidation. Each stale component explicitly states that the functionality is 'now handled inline in index.ts' or 'now defined inline in index.ts'. The README table also shows all stale files as 'STALE - file removed'. This reflects understanding of the consolidated index.ts structure and provides actionable information for updating docs.

judgment.summary: The agent successfully identified all stale component references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized that functionality was consolidated into index.ts during v2 refactoring. The documentation audit clearly marks each stale component with its status and notes how the code has been reorganized.
